meanings.definition: Objects or structures made of wood.
meanings.sent1: The table was beautifully crafted with intricate woodwork.
meanings.sent2: The cabin's woodwork was well-preserved and added to its rustic charm.
meanings.sent3: The woodwork on the birdhouse made the birds feel like they were living in a mansion.
meanings.sent4: The woodwork of the ship resembled a forest floating on the sea.
meanings.sent5: The woodwork of the chair was so smooth that it felt like touching silk.

meanings.definition: The craft or skill of working with wood.
meanings.sent1: His expertise in woodwork allowed him to create beautiful furniture.
meanings.sent2: She learned woodwork from her grandfather and now makes unique wooden toys.
meanings.sent3: The magician's greatest trick was making a table disappear using his woodwork skills.
meanings.sent4: Her woodwork was like magic, turning plain planks into works of art.
meanings.sent5: The woodwork of the carpenter was so precise that every joint fit perfectly.

meanings.definition: The act of shaping or constructing something out of wood.
meanings.sent1: The woodwork on the house was done by a skilled carpenter.
meanings.sent2: He enjoyed the process of woodwork, from cutting to sanding to assembling.
meanings.sent3: The woodwork of building a bird feeder turned into a fun family project.
meanings.sent4: Her woodwork on the treehouse transformed the backyard into a magical place.
meanings.sent5: The woodwork of the clockmaker was so precise that the gears never missed a beat.
